010101.name: Number of Electronic Book
010101.description: The number of the current electronic book in accounting software

010102.name: Name of Electronic Book
010102.description: The name of the current electronic book in accounting software

010103.name: Accounting Entity
010103.note: The legal name of accounting entity

010104.name: Organization Code
010104.description: The organization code of enterprises and undertakings
010104.note: prepared in accordance with the requirements of GB 11714-1997

010106.name: Industry
010106.description: The corresponding industry name under superior sector code
010106.note: Prepared in accordance with GB / T 4754

010108.name: Version
010108.description: The version number of accounting software

010109.name: Functional Currency
010109.description: The recording currency used in financial accounting of software

010110.name: Fiscal Year
010110.description: The year of the current financial statement

010111.name: Standard Version
010111.description: The standard issuing no. of the standards with which the current output files are consistent

010201.name: Number of Accounting Period
010201.description: The number of accounting period according to accounting standard
010201.note: Which support adjustment, such as the first adjustment of the 12th month, expressed as '1201'

010202.name: Opening Date of Accounting Period
010202.description: The calendar opening date of the current accounting period

010203.name: Closing Date of Accounting Period
010203.explanation: The calendar closing date of the current accounting period

010301.name: Number of Journal Entry Type
010301.description: The number of journal entry type

010302.name: Name of Journal Entry Type
010302.description: The name of journal entry type

010303.name: Abbreviation of Journal Entry Type
010303.description: The abbreviation of journal entry type
010303.note: e.g., 'ji' or 'zi' in some units of china

010401.name: Code of Exchange Rate Type
010401.description: The type code of exchange rate of the base currency to a target currency

010402.name: Name of Exchange Rate Type
010402.description: The type name of exchange rate of the base currency to a target currency

010502.name: Name of Currency
010502.description: The type name of currency concerned in accounting

010601.name: Code of Settlement Method
010601.description: The code of the form of funds settlement

010602.name: Name of Settlement Method
010602.description: The name of the form of funds settlement

010703.name: Code of Superior Department
010703.description: The code of superior department of the corresponding department

010803.name: ID Name
010803.description: The name of valid certificate as a proof of the identity of the employee
010803.note: e.g., 'ID', 'certificate of officers' and 'passport', etc.. One can choose any one if he has more valid certificates at the same time

010804.name: ID Number
010804.description: The number of employee's valid certificate

010901.name: Supplier Code Explanation: The code of supplier

010902.name: Supplier Name Description:The supplier's full name

010903.name: Supplier Abbreviation
010903.description: The abbreviated form of supplier's name

011101.name: Segment Code
011101.description: The code of other segment which electronic booking needs to use
011101.note: This does not include the fixed files having been identified, such as 'department' and 'customer'

011102.name: Segment Name
011102.description: The segment name which electronic booking need to use

011103.name: Segment Description
011103.description: The segment description which electronic booking needs to use

011104.name: Hierarchy Feature
011104.description: Whether the file value having a hierarchy feature or not

011105.name: Rule of File Encoding
011105.description: The encoding rules of customer defined file
011105.note: If the encoding rules have hierarchy feature , the number of each level is separated by '-', such as'1-2-2-2'

011201.name: Code of File Content
011201.description: The code of content value of each file

011202.name: Name of File Content
011202.description: The name of content value of each file

011203.name: Description of File Content
011203.description: The detailed description of the file content

011204.name: Parent Code of File Content
011204.description: the parent code of file content
011204.note: Referred to [Code of File Content], if there are encoding rules, parent code is automatically brought out, otherwise the hierarchical relationship is exported

011205.name: Hierarchy of File Content
011205.description: The level of the current value in the file structure

020101.name: Structure Separator
020101.description: The structure separator of subsidiary account and extended field

020102.name: Rules of Accounts Encoding
020102.description: The code of account corresponding to each level is separated by '-'

020103.name: Rules of Cash-flow-item Encoding
020103.description: The code of item corresponding to each level is separated by '-'

020104.name: Extensible Field Structure of Document
020104.description: The users can customize the additional field of the important information for the document if needed. It can be the combination of multiple extended field, or it can be null
020104.note: e.g., 'the date of transaction', up to 30 fields

020105.name: Corresponding Segment of Extensible Structure of Document
020105.description: The corresponding file for each extended field of document. It can be multiple extended fields corresponding to the same record, or it can be no file (null)

020106.name: Extensible Field Structure of Entry
020106.description: The users can customize the additional field of the important information for the entry if needed. It can be the combination of multiple extended field, or it can be null
020106.note: e.g., 'settlement method - notes type - the serials number of notes - the date of notes', up to 30 fields

020107.name: Corresponding Segment of Extensible Structure of Entry
020107.description: The corresponding file for each extended field of entry. It can be multiple extended fields corresponding to the same record, or it can be no file (null)
020107.note: e.g., 'record of settlement method - record of notes type - null - null'

020201.name: Account Number
020201.note: The categorized code of each account, according to the accounting rules and business properties

020202.name: Account Name
020202.description: The corresponding account name of the account code at the bottom level

020203.name: Hierarchy of Account
020203.explanation: The corresponding level for account code in the account hierarchy

020204.name: Account Type
020204.note: e.g., 'assets', 'liabilities', 'the shareholder and owner's equity', 'cost' and 'profit and loss', etc.

020301.name: Number of Subsidiary Item Explanation: The number of subsidiary item

020302.name: Name of Subsidiary Item Explanation: The name of subsidiary item

020303.name: Corresponding File
020303.description: The file corresponding to subsidiary item
020303.note: e.g., 'department file', 'employee file', 'supplier file', 'customer file', 'name of customer defined file'

020304.name: Description of Subsidiary Item
020304.description: The detailed description of subsidiary item

020401.name: Code of Cash Flow Item
020401.description: The code of cash flow item

020402.name: Name of Cash Flow Item
020402.description: The name of cash flow item

020403.name: Description of Cash Flow Item
020403.description: The detailed description of cash flow item

020404.name: Bottom of Hierarchy
020404.description: Whether at the bottom of hierarchy

020405.name: Hierarchy of Cash Flow Item
020405.description: The level of current cash flow item

020406.name: Parent of Cash Flow Item
020406.description: The parent code of cash flow item

020407.name: Data Source of Cash Flow
020407.note: The data source of the cash flow item, e.g., the main statement or subsidiary statement. '1' means 'the main statement', '0' means 'the subsidiary statement'

020408.name: Property of Cash Flow Item
020408.description: The property of the cash flow item

020501.name: Opening Balance Debit or Credit
020501.description: The opening balance of debit or credit direction for the account

020502.name: Closing Balance Debit or Credit
020502.description: The ending balance of debit or credit direction for the account

020504.name: Amount of Beginning Balance
020504.note: The beginning balance amount of the account

020505.name: Beginning Balance of Local Currency
020505.description: The beginning local currency balance of the account

020506.name: Beginning Balance of Functional Currency
020506.explanation: The beginning functional currency balance of the account

020508.name: Debit Amount of Local Currency
020508.note: The debit amount of local currency

020509.name: Debit Amount of Functional Currency
020509.note: The debit amount of functional currency

020511.name: Credit Amount of Local Currency
020511.note: The credit amount of local currency

020512.name: Credit Amount of Functional Currency
020512.note: The credit amount of functional currency

020514.name: Ending Balance of Local Currency
020514.description: The ending balance of local currency

020515.name: Ending Balance of Functional Currency
020515.description: The ending balance of functional currency

020601.name: Date of Journal Entry
020601.description: The date of making of journal entry

020602.name: Number of Journal Entry
020602.explanation: The sequential number of journal entry

020603.name: Line Number of Journal Entry
020603.explanation: The sequential number of a line of a journal entry

020604.name: Summary of Journal Entry
020604.description: A brief description of the business journal entry

020607.name: Value of Extensible Field Structure of Document
020607.description: The value defined by user in current document header; user-defined fields value of present voucher head

020608.name: Value of Extensible Field Structure of Entry
020608.explanation: The field value of the current line defined by users; user-defined fields value of present journalizing; self-presentation field value of entry line

020615.name: Accountant in Charge of Entering
020615.description: The accountant in charge of entering

020617.name: Sign of Cancellation
020617.description: The sign of cancellation for journal entry already formed but not yet posted

020618.name: Source Module of Journal Entry
020618.description: The name of source module of journal entry
020618.note: e.g., 'null' for 'general ledger', others for 'receivables', 'payables', 'salary', 'fixed assets', etc.

020701.name: Line Number of Cash Flow
020701.description: The sequential line number of cash flow

020702.name: Summary of Cash Flow
020702.description: A brief description of the operating cash flow

020703.name: Cash Flow Amount of Local Currency
020703.description: The cash flow amount of local currency

020704.name: Cash Flow Amount of Functional Currency
020704.description: The cash flow amount of functional currency

020802.name: Statement Name
020802.note: e.g., 'statement of financial position', 'statement of comprehensive income', 'statement of cash flow', 'statement of shareholder equity

020804.name: Reporting Period of Statement
020804.note: e.g., the reporting period of the statement of comprehensive income is '2008', the reporting period of the report in December 2008 is '200812'

020901.name: Number of Statement Item
020901.description: The sequential number of statement item

020903.name: Formula of Statement Item
020903.description: The formula of statement items, such as reconciliation

030101.name: Number of Document Type
030101.description: The serial number of document type

030201.name: Code of Transaction Type
030201.note: The transaction type is a refinement of the document type, different types of transactions reflect different rules and processing procedures in business

030301.name: Entering Date
030301.description: The entering date of accounting documents generated in receivable/receipts business or payable/payment business

030302.name: Balance of Functional Currency
030302.description: The balance of receivables, payables or collection business and payment which measured in functional currency

030303.name: Balance of Local Currency
030303.description: The balance of account receivables or payables which is calculated in local currency

030304.name: Debit or Credit Amount of Functional Currency
030304.description: The debit or credit amount of business in functional currency

030306.name: Debit or Credit Amount of Local Currency
030306.description: The debit or credit amount of business in local currency
030306.note: The exchange gains and losses recorded by the local currency may be 0

030307.name: Summary
030307.description: A brief description of the business

030308.name: Due Date
030308.description: The due date of the account receivable
030308.note: If a transaction has more than one due date, it is necessary to export each transaction due date as 'YYYYMMDD'

030309.name: Number of Write-Off Journal Entry
030309.description: The number of write-off journal entry corresponding to the current transaction
030309.note: 1)If the current document is a receivable sheet (invoice), the write-off journal entry is the certification number of the corresponding cash register. If the current document is a receipt note, the write-off journal entry is the certification number of the corresponding note receivable. (2)If a business has been involved in several verification, it is necessary to export corresponding write-off journal entry according to document number

030310.name: Date of Reconciliation
030310.description: The date of reconciliation of the current business

030311.name: Number of Document
030311.description: The serial number of receivables invoices

030313.name: Contract Number
030313.description: The related contract number of the receivables

030314.name: Item Number
030314.description: The recording the related item number of the receivables

030315.name: Payment Date
030315.description: The payment date of the account receivable by the customer

030316.name: Write-Off Sign
030316.description: The write-off sign of transaction business
030316.note: '0' means that it is not written off, '1'means that it has been written off

040101.name: Number of PPE Reconciliation Account
040101.description: The number of PPE reconciliation account

040102.name: Number of PPE Impairment Provision Reconciliation Account
040102.description: The number of PPE impairment provision reconciliation account

040103.name: Number of Accumulated Depreciation Reconciliation Account
040103.description: The number of accumulated depreciation reconciliation account

040201.name: Encoding Rules of PPE Categories
040201.description: The encoding rules of PPE categories
040201.note: The code of PPE category corresponding to each level is separated by '-', such as '2-2' or '2-2-2'

040301.name: Code of Change Mode in PPE
040301.description: The code of various change modes of PPE card
040301.note: e.g., '01' means 'purchase', '02' means 'disposal', '03' means 'impairment' , '04' means 'revaluation', '05' means 'change in historical cost', '06' means 'change in accumulated depreciation', etc.

040302.name: Name of Change Mode in PPE
040302.description: The name of various change modes of PPE

040401.name: Code of Depreciation Method
040401.description: The code of various depreciation method

040402.name: Name of Depreciation Method
040402.description: The name of various depreciation method
040402.note: e.g., 'straight line method', ' double decline balance method', 'sum of year-digits method'

040403.name: Depreciation Formula
040403.note: e.g., monthly depreciation = historical cost of assets*(1-residual rate)/durable years

040501.name: Code of PPE Condition
040501.description: The code of usage status of PPE

040502.name: Name of PPE Condition
040502.description: The name of various usage status of PPE
040502.note: e.g., 'in use', 'unused', 'not in use for seasonal factors' etc.

040601.name: Card Number of PPE
040601.description: The number of cards for registration of PPE

040607.name: Expected Durable Months of PPE
040607.description: The expected service months of PPE

040608.name: Depreciated Months
040608.description: The accumulated months for depreciation of PPE in the current accounting period

040610.name: Accumulated Depreciation of PPE
040610.description: The accumulated depreciation of PPE at the current period

040611.name: Carrying Amount of PPE
040611.description: The carrying amount of PPE at the end of current period

040612.name: Accumulated Impairment Provision of PPE
040612.description: The accumulated impairment provision of PPE at the end of current period

040613.name: Net Residual Value Ratio of PPE
040613.description: The net residual value ratio of PPE at the end of current period

040614.name: Net Residual Value of PPE
040614.description: The net residual value of PPE at the end of current period

040615.name: Monthly Depreciation Ratio of PPE
040615.description: The monthly depreciation ratio of PPE

040616.name: Monthly Depreciation of PPE
040616.description: The depreciation of PPE during the current period

040619.name: Accumulated Usage of PPE Capacity
040619.description: The accumulated total PPE capacity used at the end of the current period

040701.name: Tag Number of PPE
040701.description: The unique serial number of physical units and a tag number which can be found in a specific kind. If there is only one card number, it can be the same as the asset card number; if more, it should be the number of each kind.

040702.name: Location of PPE
040702.description: The location of physical storage of PPE

040801.name: Depreciation Allocation Proportion
040801.description: The depreciation allocation proportion of each department
040801.note: If PPE is shared by multiple departments, it will be shown in different lines

040901.name: Serial Number of PPE Decrement
040901.description: The serial number of PPE decrement
040901.note: It can be the serial number or the number of document

040904.name: Decrement of PPE Historical Cost
040904.description: The decrement of PPE historical cost

040905.name: Decrement of PPE Accumulated Depreciation
040905.description: The decrement of PPE accumulated depreciation

040906.name: Impairment Provision of Decrement of PPE
040906.description: The impairment provision of decrement of PPE

040907.name: Residual Value of Decrement of PPE
040907.description: The residual value of decrement of PPE

040908.name: Revenue of PPE Disposal
040908.description: The revenue generated during the process of PPE disposal

040909.name: Expense of PPE Disposal
040909.description: The expense generated during the process of PPE disposal

040910.name: Reason for PPE Decrement
040910.description: The reason for decrement of PPE

041101.name: Serial Number of Changes in PPE
041101.description: The serial number of the record of changes in PPE

041102.name: Date of Changes in PPE
041102.description: The date of the change of PPE

041103.name: Method or Value before Changes in PPE
041103.description: The method or value before changes in PPE
041103.note: e.g., before changes in PPE, 'straight line method' was used or the historical cost was '10000'

041104.name: Method or Value after Changes in PPE
041104.description: The method or value after changes in PPE
041104.note: e.g., after changes in PPE, 'double declining balance method' is used or the historical cost becomes '20000'

041105.name: Reason for Changes in PPE
041105.description: The reasons for changes in PPE

050101.name: Payroll Year,
050101.description: The year number of payment to employees

050102.name: Number of Payroll Period
050102.description: The period number of payroll, usually by monthly payment

050103.name: Beginning Date of Payroll Period
050103.description: The beginning date of payroll period

050104.name: Ending Date of Payroll Period
050104.description: The ending date of payroll period

050201.name: Name of Payroll Category
050201.description: The categories are defined depending on the different types of employees and different payment time
050201.note: e.g., 'senior executive compensation' and 'piecework compensation' may be considered as two different categories, and different payroll categories can be operated by different persons

050301.name: Employee Type
050301.note: According to needs of staff management

050401.name: Payroll Amount
050401.description: The amount of current payroll payment
